meanings.sent1: Yesterday, the plane nosedove towards the ground.
meanings.sent2: The bird nosedove swiftly to catch its prey.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel nosedove down the tree trunk to escape the cat.
meanings.sent4: Her grades nosedove after she stopped studying.
meanings.sent5: The roller coaster nosedove down the steep track, thrilling the riders.

meanings.sent1: The brave diver nosedove into the pool from the high platform.
meanings.sent2: The squirrel nosedove from the branch to the ground below.
meanings.sent3: The acrobat nosedove off the trapeze with grace and precision.
meanings.sent4: The bungee jumper nosedove towards the river below, feeling the rush of adrenaline.
meanings.sent5: The otter nosedove into the water, disappearing beneath the surface in search of fish.

meanings.definition: nosedove: to decrease rapidly and sharply
meanings.sent1: The stock prices nosedove after the company's scandal was revealed.
meanings.sent2: Her energy levels nosedove after staying up all night.
meanings.sent3: The temperature nosedove as the sun set behind the mountains.
meanings.sent4: The population of the town nosedove when the factory closed down.
meanings.sent5: His mood nosedove when he received the bad news.
